text: I just read through the spec and it looks great.  One question, will the SDK be providing the functions for getting the blockchain information that the current REST API provides?  Specifically /chain, /chain/blocks, and /transactions.
Yes
since Rest api is deprecated,  SDK will provide the features to get the blockchain info
Thanks, I was hoping that would be the answer.
Definitely we will support that fuctionality :slightly_smiling_face:
